posts.title: Voices in Hip Hop: A Booklist
posts.text: These books, written by legendary voices from the hip hop world, are a must for any hip hop head—old or new—or any fan of music in general.

posts.title: Lean Into a Cold Winter with These Graphic Novels
posts.text: We are rapidly approaching the winter season, so why not set the mood with a few books that use harsh, cold settings as their backdrops.

posts.title: Press Play! A Gamer's Booklist
posts.text: Here’s a list of books that will give you insights on video gaming, tips for the hottest games or provide a fun video game-themed fiction read. Are you up for the challenge?
